mdRecord.dcterms:title: VA Association of Fire Chiefs Memorandum Regarding the Annual Convention and Fire College, May 26, 1954
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Memorandum written on May 26, 1954, concerning the VA Association of Fire Chiefs' annual convention being held in Danville, as well as the annual State Fire College that would be held in Norfolk.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fire departments
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
